Room.Name: Middle of the Stone Bridge
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing at the center of a stone bridge spanning the Ashton River.
Room.LongDescription: The western end of the bridge has a gate across it, but the eastern end is clear, and connects to a road running south along the river bank. The center of the bridge is wide, high and solid, providing a wonderful view of the Ashton Falls in the river to the south.
